settings.title: Scenting For Business
settings.text: Scent has a powerful effect on long term memories & emotions. Used in the correct way it can trigger instant connections resulting in positive consumer behavior and expands your brand recognition.
Commercial Scent Machines: Advances your brand image, heightens value of perception, creates a warm and welcoming atmosphere & helps your customer feel at ease and ready to buy.

System Set Up & Management—
We provide consistent, long term and low-maintenance solutions that other scenting systems cannot compare to.

Custom Scent Design—
Our expert aromacologists can curate a signature scent that best fits your brand.

Private Labeling & Distribution—
Use our expanded scent library to strengthen your own line of authentic scent accents.

settings.title: We Make Business Scenting Easy.
settings.text: Heighten your brand personality and boost customer relationships through scenting. Talk with a Hotel Collection Business Consultant today.

settings.title: Design of a Fragrance for a Global Brand
settings.text: The task of creating an olfactory trademark for Luxury Living products that could capture their exquisite workmanship, immaculate design, and ageless sophistication was given to Hotel Collection. Today, the distinctive scent Hotel Collection created can be found in Luxury Living showrooms all over the world.

settings.title: Discovering the Ideal Signature Scent
settings.text: The Atlantis is widely regarded as The Bahamas' finest hotel and is unquestionably the most opulent and well-known resort out of all island chains. We worked with their team and created their scenting system and chose an ideal distinctive scent—a sumptuous fusion of floral, citrus, and ocean notes.

settings.title: Installing A High-End Scent Diffusion System
settings.text: W Hotels, a world renowned hotel brand that takes pleasure in offering one-of-a-kind ultra-sensory retreats for its guests. Despite having a Signature Scent already, their deployment system was unable to scent uniformly and consistently. With no diffusion technology in place, they were left spraying room spray throughout the hotel, creating an ineffective use of labor as well as an inadequate longevity of scent. Not only did Hotel Collection provide better scent coverage throughout their buildings with our Cold Air Diffusion technology, but we were also able to perfectly match their Signature Scent blend.

​​Our property has benefited greatly from Hotel Collection. Everyone asks us where we got our scent the instant they walk in. People love to visit our office because of the inviting ambiance the scent creates in the halls. Whether you have a small house or a big office or hotel facility, I would suggest Hotel Collection. Everyone enjoys the scent we use!"


— Bailey G.
Property Manager | Stella
http://livestella.com/

“When developing an engaging brand experience at tradeshows and conferences, it’s sometimes hard to find something that fits with the brand and really enhances the experience. We discovered that particular something with Hotel Collection. By adding our new brand scent, we can appeal to all five senses of potential clients."
